            java.lang.String color,
            int hidingBuilding,
            int strength)
     throws GettingJump.CityOfHeroesExcepcion
        Constructor for objects of class Heroes
        Parameters:
        color - A string that represents the color of the hero.
        hidingBuilding - The number of the building in which the hero lives.
        strength - A number that represents the strength of the hero(the maximum strength is 100).
        Throws:
        GettingJump.CityOfHeroesExcepcion

      • heroSmashBuilding

        protected boolean heroSmashBuilding(java.math.BigDecimal tempY,
                                    java.math.BigDecimal actualY,
                                    java.math.BigDecimal actualX,
                                    int i,
                                    double angle)
        Verifies if in a jump smashes with a building
        Parameters:
        tempY - the height that has the hero in the moment
        actualY - the vertical coordinate of the building
        actualX - the horizontal coordinate of the building
        i - the index of the building
        angle - the angle of the jump
        Returns:
        The boolean value that represents if the hero smashes or not the building

      • ifHeroOutOfLimits

        protected boolean ifHeroOutOfLimits(java.math.BigDecimal xi,
                                    java.math.BigDecimal x,
                                    java.math.BigDecimal citySizeX,
                                    java.math.BigDecimal yi,
                                    java.math.BigDecimal y,
                                    java.math.BigDecimal citySize)
        Verifies if in a jump hero goes out of the city
        Parameters:
        xi - the initial horizontal coordinate of the Hero
        x - the actual horizontal coordinate of the Hero
        yi - the initial vertical coordinate of the Hero
        y - the actual horizontal coordinate of the Hero
        citySizeX - the size of the Width of the City
        citySize - the size of the Height of the City
        Returns:
        The boolean value that represents if the hero gets out of the city
